replies.body: First off, your account starts off with 3 refund tokens that you can use all on your own to refund something you may have changed your mind about having purchased. After that, if you need any help getting something refunded you can always reach out to our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!
problematic it's years since I played my account (2013) and I've used my refunds on silly things. pretty shame that it doesn't regenerate or smt after some time

I mentioned above, but if you still need any help with something that you need to be refunded you can always reach out to our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as well.

Once a transaction has been concluded money cannot be refunded.  You can try sending a support ticket in and if there are extenuating circumstances, they may issue you a one time refund.
Otherwise, the only refunds are for for skins/champions ingame to get your RP back and there are a maximum of 3 usages for that.

Hope I was able to help you :)
